items.title: Identity as the new perimeter: National Oilwell Varco’s approach to stopping the 79% of attacks that are malware-free
items.description: NOV’s CIO led a cyber strategy fusing Zero Trust, AI, and airtight identity controls to cut threats by 35x and eliminating reimaging.

items.title: Windsurf: OpenAI’s potential $3B bet to drive the ‘vibe coding’ movement
